00018 static const DbjComponent componentId = Support;

00020 
00033 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00034 {
00035     DbjErrorCode rc = DBJ_SUCCESS;
00036     DbjError error;
00037 
00038     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00039 
00040     if ((argc != 1 && argc != 2) ||
00041             (argc == 2 && DbjStringCompare(argv[1], "force") != DBJ_EQUALS)) {
00042         printf("\nUsage: %s [force]\n\n", argv[0]);
00043         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00044     }
00045 
00046     {
00047         DbjSystem system;
00048         rc = system.stop(argc == 2 ? true : false);
00049         if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00050             DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00051             goto cleanup;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055  cleanup:
00056     {
00057         char errorMessage[1000];
00058         error.getError(errorMessage, sizeof errorMessage);
00059         printf("%s\n", errorMessage);
00060     }
00061     return error.getErrorCode() == DBJ_SUCCESS ? EXIT_SUCCESS : EXIT_FAILURE;
00062 }
